title: Banned over more accounts
body:
Hey, I was just banned for hacking on my second account even though i dont have a hacking program. Now I cant get into my other account and it dosn't say why.
Could it be that they also banned the other account.

Extra notes:
I reinstalled LOL 3 times now 
I made an 3 account to check if that got banned to (it didnt)

All the help would be much appreciated :D Thanks{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Have you opened a support ticket for it?
